title: Ian Harvey (rugby union)
text: Ian Hamilton Harvey (1 January 1903 – 22 October 1966) was a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Lock">lock</a>, Harvey represented <a href="Wairarapa%20Rugby%20Football%20Union">Wairarapa</a> at a provincial level, and was a member of the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, from 1924 to 1928. He played 18 matches for the All Blacks, including one international.
